channel.title: Christmas Special 1969
channel.description:
A special radio program produced at the University of Michigan to celebrate the 1969 Christmas season.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Gift of the Magi
item.description: This program features a production of Don Gillis' opera, "The Gift Of The Magi," based on the O. Henry story of the same name.
item.dc:creator: Henry, O., 1862-1910
item.dc:subject: U.S. Literature
